metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15522 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in LINBIT csync2 through 2.0. csync_daemon_session in daemon.c neglects to force a failure of a hello command when the configuration requires use of SSL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-15522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

csync2 - 2.0-25-gc0faaf9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: csync2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0-25-gc0faaf9-1').
